lyrics.text: Lesson 14. Do you speak English? First listen and then answer the question. Did the young
lyrics.translation: 第14课。你会说英语吗？首先听录音，然后回答问题。那个年轻人

lyrics.text: man speak English? I had an amusing experience last year. After I had left a small village
lyrics.translation: 男人说英语吗？去年我有过一次有趣的经历。在我离开一个小村庄之后

lyrics.text: in the south of France, I drove on to the next town. On the way, a young man waved to
lyrics.translation: 在法国南部，我开车前往下一个城镇。在路上，一个年轻人向我挥手

lyrics.text: me. I stopped and he asked me for a list. As soon as he had got into the car, I said
lyrics.translation: 我。我停下来，他向我要了一张清单。他一上车，我就说

lyrics.text: good morning to him in French and he replied in the same language. Apart from a few words,
lyrics.translation: 早上好，用法语对他说，他用同样的语言回答。除了几个词之外，

lyrics.text: I do not know any French at all. Neither of us spoke during the journey. I had nearly
lyrics.translation: 我一点法语都不会。我们俩在旅途中都没有说话。我差点

lyrics.text: reached the town when the young man suddenly said very slowly, do you speak English? As
lyrics.translation: 到达小镇时，年轻人突然慢慢地说，你会说英语吗？

lyrics.text: I soon learnt, he was English himself.
lyrics.translation: 我很快了解到，他自己就是英国人。
